div.p: This code system https://i-tech-uw.github.io/openelis-global2-fhir-ig/codesystem-diagnostic-report-status defines the following codes:

tr.td: The report is complete and verified by an authorized person.
Verified early results are available, but not all results are final.
The existence of the report is registered, but there is nothing yet available.

The authoring/source system does not know which of the status values currently applies for this observation. Note: This concept is not to be used for "other" - one of the listed statuses is presumed to apply, but the authoring/source system does not know which.

definition.value: The report is complete and verified by an authorized person.
Verified early results are available, but not all results are final.
The existence of the report is registered, but there is nothing yet available.

The authoring/source system does not know which of the status values currently applies for this observation. Note: This concept is not to be used for "other" - one of the listed statuses is presumed to apply, but the authoring/source system does not know which.
